message.body: Been better. How about you though?
Not too bad I have to say. At work early, it's nice and quiet. Have the whole place to my self practically. Where are you located?
A suburb of the District of Criminals hahaha. You?
Ha ha. Apt name. My husband grew up in Herndon so I'm fairly familiar with it. Now we live in San Francisco.
What do you do near DC?
HEHAHEHA Yup, born in Reston. Nothing like living in the blast radius. woooo. Plenty of political events. I volunteer alot, but that's just me.
LOL "blast radius" nice. I love that! Do you have plans for the weekend?
Yup, tomorrow I'm volunteering for an event where people throw massive amounts of tomatoes at one another
Like San Fermin in Spain? Sounds like a mess, but fun anyway. Is it a benefit for some group or just a fun event?
Err... Not San Fermin. The other one? Bunol? Anyway, you get the point.
Yeah! For a sec there I was like "Bull running in dc???" It's just fer fun :)
Bull running in DC tho. Would like to see that... But only if we can pick the runners (thinking Capitol Hill)....
